item.title: 美国关税冲击全球市场，乐高越南新厂开业
item.description: 乐高公司（Lego A/S）对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）向美国贸易伙伴发起的新关税浪潮毫不畏惧，这家全球最大的玩具制造商在越南开设了一个新的生产基地。【原文：Lego A/S is undaunted by the wave of new tariffs President Donald Trump unleashed on US trading partners as the world’s largest toymaker opened a new production complex in Vietnam.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚派遣大型防务公司代表团与乌克兰建立联系
item.description: 本周，30 家爱沙尼亚国防企业访问了乌克兰，这是波罗的海国家组织的规模最大的一次访问，目的是培养行业联系，并在战区寻求战场测试机会。【原文：Thirty Estonian defense businesses visited Ukraine this week, the largest trip of its kind to be organized by the Baltic nation to cultivate industry ties and seek battlefield testing opportunities in a war zone.】

item.title: 12 800 美元的关税打击让一些住宅建筑商盯上了副业
item.description: 2005 年卡特里娜飓风过后，兰斯-托马斯成为新奥尔良的一名房屋建筑商。在随后的几年里，他已经习惯了经济混乱— 从Covid-19到天价保险费，这些都在抑制该地区的住房需求。【原文：Lance Thomas became a homebuilder in New Orleans in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina in 2005. In the years that followed, he got used to economic disruptions — from Covid-19 to sky-high insurance premiums that are tanking housing demand in the area.】

item.title: 津巴布韦发行美元债券支付前农民的土地征用款
item.description: 津巴布韦发行了价值 3.08 亿美元的国债，并向 25 年前在国家支持的土地改革计划下被剥夺财产的白人农民支付了小额现金。【原文：Zimbabwe issued treasury bonds worth $308 million and made small cash payments to White farmers who were dispossessed of their property 25 years ago under a state-backed land reform program.】

item.title: 日本最高外汇官员对关税冲击深表担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施在全球金融市场掀起轩然大波，日本最高货币官员表示，他正在密切关注外汇走势。【原文：Japan’s top currency official said he’s watching foreign exchange movements with deep concern, as the rollout of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs sent shock waves through global financial markets.】

item.title: 英国央行警告市场 "进一步急剧修正 "的风险很高
item.description: 英国央行表示，对冲基金在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布加征关税后市场剧烈波动的情况下，面临其主要经纪人 "大量 "追加保证金的要求，并警告称市场 "进一步大幅调整 "的风险仍然很高。【原文：The Bank of England said hedge funds have faced “significant” margin calls from their prime brokers as they navigated extreme market volatility in the aftermath of US President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements and warned that the risk of “further sharp corrections” in markets remains high.】

item.title: 关税重创 S&P 500 指数，交易员寻求难以捉摸的市场底部
item.description: 在经历了五年来最大的四天溃败之后，交易员们正在寻找美国股市的底部，但关键技术指标显示，未来还会有更多的痛苦。【原文：Traders are looking for a US stock-market bottom after the biggest four-day rout in five years, but key technical indicators suggest more pain is ahead.】

item.title: 据称马来西亚顶级电话公司将为出售 Edotco 寻求顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Edotco Group Sdn.公司的所有者正在寻求一位财务顾问，以帮助出售这家马来西亚电信塔公司，包括债务在内，该公司的估值可能在 30 亿美元左右。【原文：The owners of Edotco Group Sdn. are seeking a financial adviser to help with a sale that could value the Malaysian telecommunication tower company at about $3 billion including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 印度央行行长认为关税将影响经济增长
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，美国的关税将打击印度的经济增长，这是官方首次表明贸易行动的负面影响。【原文：India’s central bank Governor Sanjay Malhotra said US tariffs will hit the economy’s growth, the first official indication of the negative consequences of the trade action.】

item.title: 大众借势特斯拉疲软 电动车销量大增
item.description: 由于欧洲最大的汽车制造商受益于电动汽车需求的激增，大众汽车公司第一季度的全球交付量有所增长。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s global deliveries rose in the first quarter as Europe’s biggest automaker benefited from surging demand for its electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美国关税加剧印尼忧虑，普拉博沃向政治对手梅加瓦蒂示好
item.description: 在美国关税威胁笼罩东南亚最大经济体之际，印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托一年多来首次会见了印尼事实上的反对党领导人，希望以此安抚投资者。【原文：President Prabowo Subianto met the leader of Indonesia’s de facto opposition party for the first time in more than a year, looking to reassure investors as a US tariff threat hung over Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.description: 一位海军高级将领称，旨在生产数千架武装无人机以削弱中国在西太平洋军事力量的 "复制者 "计划在五角大楼新领导层的领导下 "生机勃勃"。【原文：The Replicator initiative, aimed at producing thousands of armed drones to blunt China’s military power in the Western Pacific is “alive and well” under the Pentagon’s new leadership, according to a senior Navy admiral.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦称关税有利于 "很快 "再次降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行应 "尽快 "降息，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策和对全球市场造成的影响有利于降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower interest rates “soon” as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs and the fallout on global markets favor such a move, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 塔塔钢铁将在荷兰裁员 20% 进行重大重组ANP
item.description: 荷兰新闻社 ANP 援引不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道称，作为重大重组的一部分，塔塔钢铁有限公司计划在荷兰裁员近 1800 人。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd. plans to cut nearly 1,800 jobs in the Netherlands as part of a major reorganization, Dutch newswire ANP reported, citing unidentified people familiar.】

item.title: 奢侈品股票分析师警告关税动荡将冲击客户财富
item.description: 分析师警告说，奢侈品制造商需要担心的不是关税，而是随之而来的股市大跌对客户财富的打击。【原文：It’s not tariffs that luxury-goods makers need to worry about, but the hit to client wealth from the ensuing stock market carnage, analysts warn.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特称利率处于中性区间上限
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，目前利率已接近不再限制经济活动的水平。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said interest rates are now close to levels where they no longer restrict economic activity.】

item.title: 埃及将迎来温和的夏季开端，促进欧洲的液化天然气采购
item.description: 埃及夏季开始时的温和天气推迟了对液化天然气进口量增加的需求，并在关键的储存季节到来之前为欧洲留出了更多的燃料。【原文：A mild start to summer weather in Egypt is delaying the need for higher imports of liquefied natural gas, and leaving more of the fuel available for Europe ahead of a crucial stockpiling season.】

item.title: 印度央行立场和流动性誓言令印度债券抵御全球大跌
item.description: 由于印度央行放宽了政策立场，并表示将确保向银行提供充足的流动性，印度债券上涨，一反全球大跌的颓势。【原文：Indian bonds gained, defying a global selloff, as the central bank eased its policy stance and said it would ensure sufficient liquidity to banks.】

item.title: 为规避关税，个人电脑出货量四年来增长最快
item.description: 从苹果公司到戴尔科技公司等公司在关税来临前加快了在全球的产品交付，个人电脑出货量创下了自大流行病以来的最快增长速度。【原文：PC shipments grew at their fastest pace since the pandemic after companies from Apple Inc. to Dell Technologies Inc. hastened product deliveries around the world before tariffs hit.】

item.title: 首席执行官离职后，拉脱维亚寻求邻国投资波罗的海航空公司
item.description: 拉脱维亚总理表示，拉脱维亚已就投资波罗的海航空公司（Air Baltic Corp AS）一事与邻国进行了接触，此前这家国有航空公司在计划首次公开募股之前解雇了首席执行官。【原文：Latvia has reached out to neighboring countries about investing in Air Baltic Corp AS, its premier said, after the state-owned airline dismissed its chief executive officer ahead of plans for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 贾尚卡尔称印度的关税战略是寻求美国贸易协议
item.description: 印度外交部长苏布拉马尼亚姆-杰尚卡尔（Subrahmanyam Jaishankar）表示，印度应对美国破坏性关税的战略是与唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府敲定贸易协定。【原文：India’s strategy to counter the US’s damaging tariffs is to finalize a trade agreement with President Donald Trump’s government, Foreign Minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar said.】

item.title: 约 90% 被送往萨尔瓦多的移民没有美国犯罪记录
item.description: 特朗普政府官员将上个月被驱逐到萨尔瓦多监狱的这些人描述为 "最坏中的最坏"，暗示他们是参与谋杀、强奸和绑架的帮派成员。【原文：Trump administration officials have described the men deported to El Salvador prisons last month as “the worst of the worst,” suggesting they were gang members involved in murder, rape and kidnapping.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨谈特朗普的革命性历史举措
item.description: 我们应该如何理解特朗普的关税政策？显然，它们对股市的影响非常糟糕。小企业似乎对它们恨之入骨。能源公司也不喜欢。美国制造商在谈论关税将如何使制造业更加困难。然而，我们有关税。那么，谁会从中受益呢？有什么意义？我们应该如何理解美国历史上的这一时刻？在本期节目中，我们将与我们最喜爱的嘉宾之一、Macqu全球办公桌战略主管维克多-什韦茨（Viktor Shvets）进行对话。【原文：How should we make sense of the Trump tariffs? They’ve been terrible for the stock market, obviously. Small businesses seem to hate them. Energy companies aren’t fans either. US manufacturers are talking about how the tariffs will make manufacturing harder. And yet we have them. So who stands to benefit? What’s the point? And how should we understand this moment in American history? On this episode we speak with one of our favorite guests, Viktor Shvets, the head of global desk strategy at Macqu】

item.title: 数百万美国人无法动用房屋净值
item.description: 一项新的研究发现，美国人近年来积累了大量住房财富；但数百万房主发现，他们实际上无法获得这些财富。【原文：Americans have amassed plenty of housing wealth in recent years — but millions of homeowners are finding they’re effectively locked out of accessing it, a new study found.】

item.title: 全球债券下跌，英国借贷成本创 1998 年以来新高
item.description: 随着美国长期利率的飙升波及全球，英国的借贷成本飙升至 1998 年以来的最高点。【原文：The UK’s borrowing costs surged to the highest since 1998 as a jump in long-dated US rates radiated around the world.】

item.title: 美股期货震荡，关税启动，中国征税成焦点
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策生效，美国股票期货出现波动，同时投资者密切关注与中国进行贸易谈判的可能性。【原文：US equity futures fluctuated as President Donald Trump’s tariffs took effect, while investors closely monitored the potential for trade talks with China.】
